Text:
Mentally sick humans doing mentally ill depraved unnatural acts? 

Gays...HOW DARE A MENTALLY ILL FACTION OF HUMANITY RUIN A WORD WHICH USED TO MEAN "HAPPY"!. 
If you are homosexual there is only ONE conclusion. You are not mentally stable. You are not sane. You are performing UNnatural acts not even supported by nature as some mentally ill people that are attracted to the same sex say. 

Homosexuality is the product of our depraved culture and depraved thinking. 
Should we accomodate and group all of our insane citizens? I mean don't horsefuckers have a right to fuck horses? This is the logic that binds "gays" and makes them think they are a minority group of "different" human beings when they are just normal human beings that are MENTALLY UNSTABLE AND MENTALLY INSANE. 

The Truth. No one will say it. I will say it. I just did. 
There is no truth to a faction of humans being "different" than the rest just because they "THINK" they are attracted to the opposite sex. Some of it is insanity..some of it society, but what spawned it were mentally unstable individuals and the toleration of them by The Fool. The Fool accomodates many/any. The Fool is our "Political Correct" society. There is a difference in being CORRECT and "Politically" correct. A HUGE difference. Politically WRONG is more like it. Terribly wrong.

Sad but true. The Truth is out. It is up to those with minds that can wrap around it and embrace it . I have as I see the logic of it. I do not hate homosexuals, but pity them for their mental insanity and misguided cultural aspects. 

You cannot argue with The Truth. You can try and whine and try again and maybe even make yourself happy about the lies you tell to The Truth. You will NEVER stop it from being The Truth, however. NEVER.

Have a nice day.

@crawling chaos007: talking about mental instabilty.....  WHO ARE YOU TO JUDGE???? 
Let everyone have their own fantasies / fetish / hobbies  / preferences etc. as long as nobody is hurt. (that probably sounds funny- "nobody is hurt" - bondage / spanking.... get it creepy crawler007?) 
Personally this is not my cup of tea at all but i suppose it makes some gays gay. And thats just fine. Live and let live. 
You are just another sad person pointing with your smelly finger. YOU are the one people should feel sorry for.

Now go back to your cave and tell your inbred homies your so called truth.
